description: Vite <7.3.0 allowed public dir traversal when symlinks were present and server was network-exposed.
root_cause: Upstream middleware failed to guard public file resolution when publicFiles was undefined.

description: mdast-util-to-hast <13.2.1 allowed unsanitized class injection via character references in fenced code blocks.
root_cause: Parser failed to prefix or sanitize class names before rendering.

description: js-yaml <4.1.1 susceptible to prototype pollution when parsing untrusted YAML.
root_cause: Insufficient schema restrictions in safeLoad equivalents.

description: glob CLI <10.5.0 allowed command injection through -c/--cmd when shell expansion was enabled.
root_cause: CLI passed matches to shell:true without sanitization.

description: ai <5.0.52 allowed filetype whitelist bypass on uploads.
root_cause: Insufficient validation of uploaded file metadata in SDK.
resolution: Upgraded ai to 5.0.115 and aligned zod peer dependency.
